item.title: Staffzone command FAIL
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

Staff zone should be.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1) { // The command and rights
teleportToX = ; // This is the x axis teleport
teleportToY = ; // This is the y axis teleport
sendMessage("Welcome to staffzone " +playerName+ ". // This will say there name
} //Credit to opium10 for making it from scratch

item.title: Staffzone command FAIL
item.dc:creator: @messer188 messer188
item.description:
@messer188 wrote:

[quote=“attk mast3r, post:2, topic:349947”]um…are you trying to make a teleport to the staffzone?

if so try this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”)&& playerRights >= 0){
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”)){
teleportToX = 2482;
teleportToY = 3046;
hieghtLevel = 0;

}

instead of restricting someone use player rights restrictions[/quote]

I Would Clean That Up A Little

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”)&& playerRights >= 0){
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”)){
teleportToX = 2482;
teleportToY = 3046;
hieghtLevel = 0;

} else {
sM(“You Must Be Staff To Teleport”);

}
